item.title: About
item.description: Welcome to My Fellow Hackers My name is Khaing Myel Khant and I’m the captain of ucsmsec ctf team. I made this about to show my team members a static website as a demo. We all know how hard is to start something on the web, especially these days. You need to prepare a bunch of stuff and after doing tons of things, we can swagg :P. I will add more on this website weeks by week.

item.title: strings - Points: 100
item.description: We first download the file from file wget --no-check-certificate https://2018shell.picoctf.com/static/aead5528718d7c26733c42fadab63b6a/strings --2019-03-30 22:04:59-- https://2018shell.picoctf.com/static/aead5528718d7c26733c42fadab63b6a/strings Check the file type khant@DESKTOP-DMG2EMG:~/ctfs/picoCTF/strings$ file strings strings: ELF 64-bit LSB executable, x86-64, version 1 (SYSV) We can see this after running this khant@DESKTOP-DMG2EMG:~/ctfs/picoCTF/strings$ ./strings Have you ever used the 'strings' function? Check out the man pages! So, I used strings and saw tons of lines of codes grep is one of the best choice when facing this situation I executed strings piped together with grep
